alert.note: Alert for Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 5:05PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pima County through 545 PM MST... At 504 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over South Tucson, or near Tucson, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and localized areas of blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Oro Valley, Marana, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Casas Adobes, Drexel Heights, Flowing Wells, South Tucson, Pascua Pueblo Yaqui Reservation, Tortolita, Catalina Foothills, Tucson International Airport, Saguaro National Park West, Summit, Valencia West, Tucson Estates, Rita Ranch, Picture Rocks and San Xavier Mission. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 244 and 273. Interstate 19 between mile markers 54 and 63. Route 77 between mile markers 70 and 80. Route 86 between mile markers 165 and 171. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
